title: Taj Mahal, India
description: The Taj Mahal in Agra is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the right bank of the river Yamuna. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the 7 Wonders of the World.
culture: Experience the rich Mughal history, intricate architecture, and the eternal symbol of love.

title: Goa Beaches, India
description: Goa is famous for its pristine beaches, vibrant nightlife, and Portuguese heritage. It offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.
culture: Enjoy Goan cuisine like vindaloo, visit historic churches, and relax at beach shacks.

title: Jaipur, India
description: Jaipur, the Pink City, is known for its stunning palaces, forts, and vibrant markets. Visit the Hawa Mahal, Amber Fort, and City Palace.
culture: Immerse in Rajasthani folk music, Kathputli puppetry, and royal hospitality.

title: Kerala Backwaters, India
description: Cruise through the tranquil backwaters of Alleppey in a traditional houseboat. Kerala is known as 'God's Own Country' for its lush greenery.
culture: Experience Ayurveda, Kathakali dance, and delicious coconut-based cuisine.

title: Varanasi, India
description: Varanasi is one of the oldest living cities in the world. The Ghats of the Ganges River offer a spiritual and mesmerizing experience.
culture: Witness the evening Ganga Aarti, explore narrow alleys, and experience deep spirituality.

title: Ladakh, India
description: Ladakh offers breathtaking landscapes with stark mountains and blue lakes like Pangong Tso. A paradise for bikers and adventure lovers.
culture: Discover Tibetan Buddhist monasteries (Gompas) and the unique Ladakhi lifestyle.

title: Udaipur, India
description: Udaipur, the City of Lakes, is famous for its lavish royal residences. The Lake Palace, located in the middle of Lake Pichola, is a sight to behold.
culture: Experience the grandeur of Rajputana history and romantic boat rides.

title: Andaman Islands, India
description: The Andaman Islands afford exotic beaches, crystal clear waters, and vibrant coral reefs. Radhanagar Beach is often voted one of the best in Asia.
culture: Enjoy water sports, seafood, and the untouched beauty of tropical islands.

title: Rishikesh, India
description: Rishikesh is the Yoga Capital of the World, situated beside the Ganges River. It is famous for yoga ashrams, suspension bridges, and river rafting.
culture: Participate in yoga retreats, meditation, and the spiritual energy of the Himalayas.

title: Hampi, India
description: Hampi is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its ancient temples and ruins of the Vijayanagara Empire. The landscape is dotted with massive boulders.
culture: Explore the history of a lost empire, ancient architecture, and hippie vibes.

title: Paris, France
description: Paris, the City of Light, offers the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and charming cafes. It is a global center for art, fashion, and culture.
culture: Enjoy French cuisine, world-class art, and romantic walks along the Seine.

title: London, UK
description: London is a 21st-century city with history stretching back to Roman times. Key sights include Big Ben, the Tower of London, and Buckingham Palace.
culture: Experience British royalty, pubs, West End theatre, and diverse history.

title: Rome, Italy
description: Rome, the Eternal City, showcases nearly 3,000 years of art, architecture, and culture. The Colosseum and Vatican City are must-visits.
culture: Indulge in pasta, pizza, history, and the dolce vita lifestyle.

title: Barcelona, Spain
description: Barcelona, the cosmopolitan capital of Spain’s Catalonia region, is known for its art and architecture, especially Gaudí’s Sagrada Família.
culture: Enjoy tapas, flamenco, and the unique Catalan modernist architecture.

title: Amsterdam, Netherlands
description: Amsterdam is known for its artistic heritage, elaborate canal system and narrow houses with gabled facades. Cycling is a way of life here.
culture: Explore canals, museums (Van Gogh), and a relaxed, liberal atmosphere.

title: Prague, Czech Republic
description: Prague, 'the City of a Hundred Spires,' is known for its Old Town Square with colorful baroque buildings and the medieval Astronomical Clock.
culture: Enjoy beer culture, gothic architecture, and historic bridges.

title: Vienna, Austria
description: Vienna lies on the Danube River. Its artistic and intellectual legacy was shaped by residents including Mozart, Beethoven and Sigmund Freud.
culture: Experience coffee house culture, classical music, and imperial palaces.

title: Zurich, Switzerland
description: Zurich is a global center for banking and finance, situated at the north end of Lake Zurich in northern Switzerland. It offers luxury and nature.
culture: Enjoy Swiss precision, chocolates, luxury shopping, and alpine views.

title: Athens, Greece
description: Athens is the capital of Greece. It was also at the heart of Ancient Greece, a powerful civilization and empire. The Acropolis is iconic.
culture: Explore ancient history, philosophy, and vibrant Mediterranean street life.

title: Lisbon, Portugal
description: Lisbon consists of pastel-colored buildings, an estuary and a suspension bridge. It is known for its cafe culture and soulful Fado music.
culture: Enjoy fresh seafood, yellow trams, and stunning coastal views.

title: Bali, Indonesia
description: Bali offers picturesque beaches, spiritual energy, and terraced rice fields. Known as the 'Island of the Gods'.
culture: Experience spiritual offerings, traditional dance, and surfing.

title: Phuket, Thailand
description: Phuket is a rainforested, mountainous island in the Andaman Sea, with some of Thailand’s most popular beaches and high-end seaside resorts.
culture: Enjoy Thai massage, street food, nightlife, and island hopping.

title: Tokyo, Japan
description: Tokyo, Japan’s bustling capital, mixes the ultramodern and the traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples.
culture: Experience Anime, Sushi, technology, and Shinto shrines.

title: Kyoto, Japan
description: Kyoto is famous for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, Shinto shrines and traditional wooden houses.
culture: Immerse in Geisha culture, tea ceremonies, and zen gardens.

title: Seoul, South Korea
description: Seoul is a huge metropolis where modern skyscrapers, high-tech subways and pop culture meet Buddhist temples, palaces and street markets.
culture: Enjoy K-Pop, Korean BBQ, skincare, and royal palaces.

title: Singapore
description: Singapore is an island city-state off southern Malaysia. It's a global financial center with a tropical climate and multicultural population.
culture: Experience Gardens by the Bay, diverse street food, and cleanliness.

title: Dubai, UAE
description: Dubai is known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture and a lively nightlife scene. Burj Khalifa dominates the skyscraper-filled skyline.
culture: Experience desert safaris, luxury malls, and futuristic architecture.

title: Maldives
description: The Maldives is a tropical nation in the Indian Ocean known for its beaches, blue lagoons and extensive reefs.
culture: Relax in overwater villas, enjoy marine life, and total privacy.

title: Hanoi, Vietnam
description: Hanoi, the capital of Vietnam, is known for its centuries-old architecture and a rich culture with Southeast Asian, Chinese and French influences.
culture: Taste Pho and Banh Mi, visit ancient temples, and enjoy chaotic charm.

title: Hong Kong
description: Hong Kong is a major global financial hub and former British colony in southeastern China. It is famous for its tower-studded skyline.
culture: Enjoy Dim Sum, vibrant markets, and the fusion of East and West.

title: New York City, USA
description: New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean. It is a global center of finance and culture.
culture: Visit Times Square, Broadway, Central Park, and eat pizza/bagels.

title: Los Angeles, USA
description: Los Angeles is a sprawling Southern California city and the center of the nation’s film and television industry.
culture: Experience Hollywood, beaches like Santa Monica, and celebrity culture.

title: Cancun, Mexico
description: Cancún, a Mexican city on the Yucatán Peninsula bordering the Caribbean Sea, is known for its beaches, numerous resorts and nightlife.
culture: Enjoy Mayan ruins (Chichen Itza), tacos, and turquoise waters.

title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description: Rio de Janeiro is a huge seaside city in Brazil, famed for its Copacabana and Ipanema beaches and 38m Christ the Redeemer statue.
culture: Experience Carnival, Samba, football, and breathtaking scenery.

title: Machu Picchu, Peru
description: Machu Picchu is an Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains in Peru, above the Urubamba River valley.
culture: Hike the Inca Trail, explore ancient history, and meet llamas.

title: Banff, Canada
description: Banff is a resort town in the province of Alberta, located within Banff National Park. The peaks of Mt. Rundle and Mt. Cascade dominate its skyline.
culture: Experience the Rockies, turquoise lakes (Louise), and wildlife.

title: Hawaii, USA
description: Hawaii is a state of the USA in the Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago of 8 major islands, known for its rugged landscapes of cliffs and waterfalls.
culture: Learn Hula, surf huge waves, and embrace the Aloha spirit.

title: Costa Rica
description: Costa Rica is a rugged, rainforested Central American country with coastlines on the Caribbean and Pacific. It is known for its beaches and biodiversity.
culture: Live the Pura Vida lifestyle, see sloths, and zip-line through jungles.

title: Las Vegas, USA
description: Las Vegas, in Nevada’s Mojave Desert, is a resort city famed for its vibrant nightlife, centered around 24-hour casinos and other entertainment options.
culture: Enjoy world-class shows, gambling, and spectacular hotels.

title: Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Buenos Aires is Argentina’s big, cosmopolitan capital city. Its center is the Plaza de Mayo, lined with stately 19th-century buildings.
culture: Experience Tango, steak dinners, and European-style architecture.

title: Cape Town, South Africa
description: Cape Town is a port city on South Africa’s southwest coast, on a peninsula beneath the imposing Table Mountain.
culture: Visit Table Mountain, penguins at Boulders Beach, and wineries.

title: Cairo, Egypt
description: Cairo, Egypt’s sprawling capital, is set on the Nile River. At its heart is Tahrir Square and the vast Egyptian Museum.
culture: See the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and ancient history.

title: Marrakech, Morocco
description: Marrakech, a former imperial city in western Morocco, is a major economic center and home to mosques, palaces and gardens.
culture: Get lost in the Medina souks, stay in a Riad, and drink mint tea.

title: Masai Mara, Kenya
description: Masai Mara National Reserve is one of the most famous and popular wildlife conservation areas in Africa, known for the Great Migration.
culture: Go on a Big 5 Safari and meet the Maasai people.

title: Seychelles
description: The Seychelles is an archipelago of 115 islands in the Indian Ocean, off East Africa. It's home to rare animals such as giant Aldabra tortoises.
culture: Enjoy exclusive luxury, granite boulders, and white sand beaches.

title: Sydney, Australia
description: Sydney, capital of New South Wales and one of Australia's largest cities, is best known for its harbourfront Sydney Opera House.
culture: See the Opera House, Bondi Beach, and enjoy the laid-back Aussie vibe.

title: Queenstown, New Zealand
description: Queenstown, New Zealand, sits on the shores of the South Island’s Lake Wakatipu, set against the dramatic Southern Alps.
culture: Try bungee jumping, skiing, and see Middle-earth landscapes.

title: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
description: Bora Bora is a small South Pacific island northwest of Tahiti in French Polynesia, surrounded by sand-fringed motus and a turquoise lagoon.
culture: The ultimate luxury honeymoon destination with crystal clear water.

title: Fiji
description: Fiji, a country in the South Pacific, is an archipelago of more than 300 islands. It's famed for rugged landscapes, palm-lined beaches and coral reefs.
culture: Experience the warmest hospitality, Bula spirit, and kava ceremonies.

title: Melbourne, Australia
description: Melbourne is the coastal capital of the southeastern Australian state of Victoria. At the city's centre is the modern Federation Square development.
culture: Enjoy coffee culture, street art, cricket, and cultural festivals.
